segments.text: I see this cozy kitchen with the sink on the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a woman drying a plate, looking so focused.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got an apron on, typical mom vibe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But wait, the faucet is running full blast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, water pouring everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling over the edge onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't noticed, her foot is already in the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over there, a boy is on a stool by the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the cookie jar, sneaky kid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks wobbly, like it might tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little girl is next to him, hand out for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're in cahoots, so cute but risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything seems calm out there, not like in here.
segments.speaker: PAR
